Indoor Plant Care Guide

Keep your indoor plants thriving with these expert care tips from our garden specialists.

Watering

Most indoor plants prefer to dry out slightly between waterings. Check the soil moisture before watering and adjust frequency based on season.

Light

Observe your plant's light requirements. Most indoor plants prefer bright, indirect light but avoid direct sunlight which can scorch leaves.

Temperature

Keep plants away from cold drafts and heating vents. Most indoor plants thrive in temperatures between 65-75°F (18-24°C).

Fertilizing

Feed your plants with a balanced liquid fertilizer during the growing season (spring and summer), following package instructions.
